 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָקַט‎</span>] **verb** ==pick or gather up==, specifically ==glean== ( Late Hebrew ***id.*** and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָקַט‎</span>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pick up*** (as a bird, grains, etc.); Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְקַט‎</span>, and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְקַט‎</span>; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Mandean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לגט‎</span> ([[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M 54</sup>, also on Talmud <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נקט‎</span>); compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***lakâtu***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 385</sup> (but <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ט‎</span> = ***t***?)); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָֽקְטוּ‎</span> [[Exod.16.22|Exod 16:22]]; [[Num.11.8|Num 11:8]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְל‎</span> consecutive [[Exod.16.4|Exod 16:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָקָ֑טוּ‎</span> [[Exod.16.18|Exod 16:18]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִלְקְטוּ‎</span> [[Exod.16.5|Exod 16:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִלְקֹט֑וּן‎</span> [[Ps.104.28|Ps 104:28]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּלְקְטוּ‎</span> [[Exod.16.17|Exod 16:17]]; [[Exod.16.21|Exod 16:21]] 2 masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּלְקְטֻהוּ‎</span> [[Exod.16.26|Exod 16:26]] ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִקְטוּ‎</span> [[Gen.31.46|Gen 31:46]]; [[Exod.16.16|Exod 16:16]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִלְקֹט‎</span> [[Exod.16.27|Exod 16:27]] + 2 t.; — 

**1.** ***pick up, gather***, with accusative, stones [[Gen.31.46|Gen 31:46]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), lilies [[Song.6.2|Song 6:2]] usually the manna: [[Exod.16.4|Exod 16:4]]; [[Exod.16.5|Exod 16:5]]; [[Exod.16.26|Exod 16:26]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), v[[Exod.16.21|Exod 16:21]] v[[Exod.16.22|Exod 16:22]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> partitive v[[Exod.16.16|Exod 16:16]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); so absolute v[[Exod.16.27|Exod 16:27]]; [[Num.11.8|Num 11:8]] ( both [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]] ), [[Exod.16.17|Exod 16:17]]; [[Exod.16.18|Exod 16:18]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); of animals gathering food <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתֵּן לָהֶם יִלְקֹט֑וּן‎</span> [[Ps.104.28|Ps 104:28]]. 

**2.** specifically ***glean***, absolute, [[Ruth.2.8|Ruth 2:8]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> local; usually Pi\`el in this sense ). **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְלִקְּטָה‎</span> consecutive [[Ruth.2.16|Ruth 2:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִקֵּ֑טָה‎</span> [[Ruth.2.17|Ruth 2:17]]; [[Ruth.2.18|Ruth 2:18]] 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִקַּטְתְּ‎</span> [[Ruth.2.19|Ruth 2:19]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְלַקִּט‎</span> [[Gen.47.14|Gen 47:14]] + 2 t.; 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּלַקִּט‎</span> [[Ruth.2.15|Ruth 2:15]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתּ‎</span> [[Ruth.2.3|Ruth 2:3]]; [[Ruth.2.17|Ruth 2:17]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּלַקִּט‎</span> [[Lev.19.9|Lev 19:9]] + 2 t.; 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲלַקֳּטָה‎</span> [[Ruth.2.2|Ruth 2:2]]; [[Ruth.2.7|Ruth 2:7]] (compare [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>NB 152, 489</sup>); ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְלַקִּט‎</span> [[Ruth.2.15|Ruth 2:15]] + 2 t.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלַקִּט‎</span> [[Isa.17.5|Isa 17:5]], plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלַקְּטִים‎</span> [[Judg.1.7|Judg 1:7]]; [[Jer.7.18|Jer 7:18]] — 

**1.** ***gather, gather up***, fallen grapes, [[Lev.19.10|Lev 19:10]] ([[BDB#H|H]]), arrows [[1Sam.20.38|1Sam 20:38]], (fire-)wood [[Jer.7.18|Jer 7:18]] absolute (food from ground) [[Judg.1.7|Judg 1:7]] (compare [[BDB#GFM|GFM]]); = ***pick, pick off***, [[2Kgs.4.39|2Kgs 4:39]] (twice in verse) (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of source ). 

**2.** figurative ***collect*** (money) [[Gen.47.14|Gen 47:14]] ([[BDB#J|J]]). 

**3.** specifically ***glean***, after the reapers, usually absolute [[Ruth.2.3|Ruth 2:3]]; [[Ruth.2.7|Ruth 2:7]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָסַף‎</span>), v[[Ruth.2.17|Ruth 2:17]] (all with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> local), v[[Ruth.2.15|Ruth 2:15]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּין‎</span> location), v[[Ruth.2.19|Ruth 2:19]] (adverb location), also v[[Ruth.2.2|Ruth 2:2]] (where <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> may be local or partitive, compare [[BDB#Be|Be]]), also v[[Ruth.2.15|Ruth 2:15]] v[[Ruth.2.16|Ruth 2:16]] v[[Ruth.2.23|Ruth 2:23]] with accusative [[Isa.17.5|Isa 17:5]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבֳּלִים‎</span>, simile of devastation of land; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָסַף קָצִיר‎</span>), [[Ruth.2.17|Ruth 2:17]]; [[Ruth.2.18|Ruth 2:18]] with accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֶקֶט‎</span> [[Lev.19.9|Lev 19:9]] = [[Lev.23.22|Lev 23:22]] ([[BDB#H|H]]). **Pu\`al** ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּלֻקְּטוּ‎</span> [[Isa.27.12|Isa 27:12]] ***ye shall be picked up*** (of Israel under figure of grains or berries, after the threshing process of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s judgment). **Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּתְלַקְּטוּ‎</span> [[Judg.11.3|Judg 11:3]] and ***there collected themselves*** worthless men unto (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span>) Jephthah (***were raked together*** [[BDB#GFM|GFM]]).
